警員Hugo wong 王俊霖
住黃大仙
興趣為健身
為健美圈中燊team中流砥柱成員
身為警員 知法犯法 未經醫生處方 購買及使用處方藥物 類固醇等
其銷售者為燊team隊長黃x燊
其家中亦藏有大量黑市處方藥
這次事件 懷疑因為使用藥物後脾氣暴躁引起
破毒品案上新聞，自己又食毒品😙

大家千奇唔好玩電話吖

xxxx7529

關於食毒品問題：驗頭髮可以驗到出來，健身常用hgh, hgf, 迪架，好多都驗到。
其實佢會冇左份工，因為使用規管藥物，大家自行決定搞唔搞佢！

quote.msg: 此回覆已被刪除

replies.msg:
如果身邊有黑警/賣港賊想去美國，一齊send去美國移民局
https://tips.fbi.gov/

仲可以一次過向兩個移民及簽證機構舉報
美國駐港澳總領事館
簽證欺詐舉報: FPUHK@state.gov
美國公民及移民服務局
舉報電郵: reportfraudtips@uscis.dhs.gov

收件者: reportfraudtips@uscis.dhs.gov , FPUHK@state.gov
主題: report on a specific candidate
I am writing to invite you to carefully re-consider the candidacy of a Hong Kong citizen: Ms Li Hung Ching as an immigrant to the USA.

As the evidence provided, it shows the candidate's fiancé, Mr. Leung Kim Hoi, misused his police power to the citizens in a mass protest regarding the withdrawal of the Extradition Bill on 12 June 2019 in Hong Kong. Per the report published by Amnesty International, Hong Kong Police Force used excessive and unnecessary force towards the protestors, and this unlawful use of force clearly violated the International Human Rights Law. In the event, he instructed his subordinates to attack the citizens deliberately even the citizens were well behaved to express their wills to the government. Especially, his rudeness and violence demonstrated in the picture and his defamatory speech show that he is not a proper police officer. Such evidences strongly show that Ms Li Hung Ching and Mr. Leung Kim Hoi will harm the homeland security of USA, and violate the principles of democracy and freedom of USA.
Although all these acts are not committed by Ms. Li and thus are not direct evidence, these can however act as circumstantial evidence doubting their integrity and ability to show loyalty to the United States of America since her husband is so committed to acting as the state machine of HKSAR, PRC to suppress citizens who are rightfully defending the rule of law and democracy in Hong Kong. Their potential marital status poses a serious question as to Ms. Li's suitability to be part of the USA. I do not think that someone who comes from a violent and very patriotic (towards China) background can be an appropriate candidacy.

I sincerely hope that you can re-consider her application.

Yours faithfully,
(Your name)
Hong Kong Citizen
